siteMetadata.title: A gentle introduction to the scientific Python ecosystem
siteMetadata.description: This is a free, open source course on how to use different Data Science Tools such as Jupyter Notebooks, relevant Python libraries, GitHub, and information about making your science FAIR. It's made possible by a long and fruitful collaboration to NSF and EarthCube. Contributions and comments on how to improve the course are welcome! To file an issue go to: https://github.com/LinkedEarth/ec_workshops_py/issues
siteMetadata.slogan: An interactive course developed by EarthCube and LinkedEarth
